title: Small-Group Collaboration Design for Co-Creation of Multimodal Science Texts

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Core Scientific Theories and Research Methodologies, Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in creating multimodal content that visualizes scientific theories in VR environments and integrates textual elements.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design multimodal content integrating text, images, and animations to explain scientific concepts
Through role division within small groups, learners execute creative problem-solving strategies using digital tools
Learners improve the scientific accuracy and expressiveness of multimodal texts through peer feedback and iterative prototyping

resources: Digital Creation Tools (Adobe Spark, Canva, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
